sentences.sentence: Exhumations are to begin when the ground thaws, probably in March.
sentences.translation: 掘墓工作很可能在三月份土地解冻时开始。

sentences.sentence: 'I wanted to make the exhumations sacred,' Peszkowski told me. 'We had Mass every day and prayers at 12 o 'clock.
sentences.translation: “我想让挖掘已逝之人尸体的过程更神圣些，”Peszkowski告诉我，“每天十二点我们都做弥撒祈祷。”
